generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian walkways are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and poles.
- building: A large brick building with windows and architectural details is prominently visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing as a light blue area with some clouds.
- person: A person wearing a white skirt is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black sedan in the foreground and other vehicles further down the road.
- traffic light: A green traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing straight ahead is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible along the sidewalk and road, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, near the building.
